segments.text: I want to think about it for some time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Please , honey , I have made proposals to you fifteen times .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know . But your way doesn't touch my heart .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , god , please tell me how .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , I want you to be happy when we are together , and when you are sad , I would always stay with you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When I am angry and want to beat someone , you stand there and let me do what I want . Would you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I would . Thanks for being in my life .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't be so happy , it is just one of my tests !
segments.speaker: S2
